metadata.title: Research Verified 100% MCT Oil - All Natural Vegan Friendly - 2 Fl. Oz. - 3 Bottles
features: It is vegan-friendly, natural, no fillers, binders, additives, or preservatives.
description: Research Verified MCT Oil, Medium Chain Triglycerides (MCT's) are fatty acids derived naturally from coconut and palm oils. They have an incredible function of being able to stabilize blood sugar and enhance ketone body production. Caprylic Acid and Capric Acid are proven to promote weight loss as well as improve cardiovascular health, boost cognitive function and a myriad of other health benefits. .

title: Research Verified Is On Your Side
